title.rendered: Webinar: How Are Security Tokens Transforming Custody?

content.rendered:
Webinar Speakers
Key takeaways
    • Traditional custodians have an important role to play in digital asset custody
    • The key to compliant security token custody is digital identity
    • Digital identities enable token recovery (restitution obligations)
    • Custodians need access to the token smart contracts, not to the investors’ wallets
    • Security Token Custody = Wallets + Smart Contract Management + Digital Identities
Upgrade Your Custody Services
Webinar Recording
Timeline of the panel’s discussions: 
  • (02:54) What are the differences between security tokens and crypto tokens?
  • (08:11) What do we mean by custody?
  • (16:13) How does custody compare with the traditional and security token world?
  • (26:48) How do digital identities play a role in custody and security tokens broadly?
  • (31:54) What do custodians, issuers and investors need for custody?
  • (35:04) What’s the point of bringing this onto the blockchain?
  • (46:10) Q&A
